forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. Southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the dawn breaks with a quiet promise of warmth, contrasting with the cooler embrace of the night. As the sun begins its ascent, the air is mostly clear, with only a gentle whisper of the marine layer retreating into the horizon. The low of 58 from last night lingers just slightly, but it won't take long for the city to wake into a comfortable, sun-soaked day. By mid-morning, the forecast hints at a high near 70, edging toward that tantalizing warmth as the afternoon unfolds.

The sky appears generous today—sunny and bright, framing the iconic features of the city in a golden light. Yet, the west-southwest winds assert themselves, bringing refreshing gusts that flutter through the streets, encouraging light layers—perhaps a long-sleeved shirt or a soft cardigan that can be easily stowed as the temperatures rise. With the weather inviting in its clarity, it’s an ideal time to meander through the vibrant neighborhoods, perhaps indulging in a leisurely coffee at a corner café or exploring the local artisans’ markets that line the streets. A stroll along the Embarcadero or through Golden Gate Park promises a delightful engagement with nature, illuminated by the day’s warmth and energy.
